price: 25. Vous y vivrez et vous y mourrez, et vous en serez sortis un Jour. »
arabic: قَالَ فِيهَا تَحۡيَوۡنَ وَفِيهَا تَمُوتُونَ وَمِنۡهَا تُخۡرَجُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: qāla fīhā taḥyawna wafīhā tamūtūna wamin'hā tukh'rajūna
